content: **tip for some cotton-like yarns it might be better to go up half a size with your hook after part 4 to avoid bubbling of the center ** jacaranda cal started 1 february 2018 there are 11 parts all parts are available if you are/become a member of the facebook group haaksteek you can find all the parts in this link https //www facebook com/notes/haaksteek/jacaranda-cal-useful-links/460079584395081/ **in all the parts 1 except for the dutch the following is missing in round 4 just before the second asterisk ** ** fpsc around the tip of tr5tog ** **the v_stitch in the chart of part 4 round 43 misses a chain-stitch ** **the parts 8 are corrected in round 71 due to a wrong naming of a stitch of round 69 in which you are crocheting it won t affect the pattern though ** **part 9 round 79 all languages omit the last ch1 in this round ** ** i updated part 11 printfriendly version dutch on 13th of april 2018 due to a mistake in the original one it is called vernieuwde printvriendelijke versie ** a beautiful tablecloth approximately 100cm x 100cm when crocheted with alize diva and hook 3 mm you will need 8 skeins of this yarn when made with worsted weight yarn and hook 5 or 5 5 mm it becomes a stunning throw **a file is available which contains the color scheme and the video index round by round thanks to kat winchester ** **video tutorial by saartje hussein** part 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=esl8yejjwxq&feature=youtu be part 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=1opmqtqxhpu&feature=youtu be part 3 https //l facebook
